postReview.title: West Ham 2-0 Leicester City: Potter's men cast aside lacklustre strugglers
postReview.description: Premier League strugglers Leicester City turned in a tame performance as they slumped to a 2-0 defeat at West Ham on Thursday.

preReview.title: 'Mountains are there to be climbed', says Van Nistelrooy on Leicester's survival hopes
preReview.description: Leicester City take on West Ham in the Premier League next, with Ruud van Nistelrooy in defiant mood about the Foxes' survival hopes.

QAData.question: Who won between West Ham United and Leicester City on Thu, 27 Feb 2025 20:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: West Ham United won 2–0 over Leicester City on Thu, 27 Feb 2025 20:00:00 GMT.
